xxl.connectivity.colt
Class RandomNumbers

java.lang.Object
  xxl.connectivity.colt.RandomNumbers

public class RandomNumbers
extends Object

This class provides some static methods to obtain pseudo random numbers of different distributions using the colt library with the Mersenne Twister PRNG (pseudo random number generator).

Field Summary
protected static Random RANDOM
          used random seed to initialize the colt PRNGs

Field Detail

RANDOM

protected static Random RANDOM
used random seed to initialize the colt PRNGs

Method Detail

gaussian

public static ContinuousRandomNumber gaussian()
Returns an iterator delivering standard normal distributed random numbers using the Mersenne Twister PRNG (pseudo random number generator).
Note:
The returned iterator delivers an infinite set of objects of type Double, so don't call Cursors.last( RandomNumbers.gaussion()).

Returns:
an iterator delivering an infinity set of standard normal distributed random numbers

gaussian

public static ContinuousRandomNumber gaussian(double mean,
                                              double standardDeviation)
Returns an iterator delivering normal distributed random numbers using the Mersenne Twister PRNG (pseudo random number generator).
Note:
The returned iterator delivers an infinite set of objects of type Double, so don't call Cursors.last( RandomNumbers.gaussion()).

Parameters:
mean - the mean of the normal distribution
standardDeviation - the standard deviation of the normal distribution
Returns:
an iterator delivering an infinity set of standard normal distributed random numbers

gaussian

public static ContinuousRandomNumber gaussian(double mean,
                                              double standardDeviation,
                                              long numberOfElements)
Returns an iterator delivering a given number of normal distributed random numbers using the Mersenne Twister PRNG (pseudo random number generator).

Parameters:
mean - the mean of the normal distribution
standardDeviation - the standard deviation of the normal distribution
numberOfElements - number of delivered pseudo random numbers
Returns:
an iterator delivering a given number of normal distributed random numbers

gaussian

public static ContinuousRandomNumber gaussian(double mean,
                                              double standardDeviation,
                                              long numberOfElements,
                                              int seed)
Returns an iterator delivering a given number of normal distributed random numbers using the Mersenne Twister PRNG (pseudo random number generator) initialized with the given seed. This method can be used to generate a sequence of random numbers repetitive.

Parameters:
mean - the mean of the normal distribution
standardDeviation - the standard deviation of the normal distribution
numberOfElements - number of delivered pseudo random numbers
seed - used seed to initialize the PRNG
Returns:
an iterator delivering a given number of normal distributed random numbers

exponential

public static ContinuousRandomNumber exponential(double lambda)
Returns an iterator delivering exponential distributed random numbers using the Mersenne Twister PRNG (pseudo random number generator).
Note:
The returned iterator delivers an infinite set of objects of type Double, so don't call Cursors.last( RandomNumbers.exponential()).

Parameters:
lambda - the lambda parameter (1/mean) of the exponential distribution
Returns:
an iterator delivering an infinity set of exponential distributed random numbers

exponential

public static ContinuousRandomNumber exponential(double lambda,
                                                 long numberOfElements)
Returns an iterator delivering a given number of exponential distributed random numbers using the Mersenne Twister PRNG (pseudo random number generator).

Parameters:
lambda - the lambda parameter (1/mean) of the exponential distribution
numberOfElements - number of delivered pseudo random numbers
Returns:
an iterator delivering a given number of exponential distributed random numbers

cuniform

public static ContinuousRandomNumber cuniform(double min,
                                              double max,
                                              long numberOfElements)
Returns an iterator delivering a given number of uniformly continuous distributed random numbers using the Mersenne Twister PRNG (pseudo random number generator).

Parameters:
min - lower bound
max - upper bound
numberOfElements - number of delivered pseudo random numbers
Returns:
an iterator delivering a given number of uniformly continuous distributed random numbers

cuniform

public static ContinuousRandomNumber cuniform(double min,
                                              double max)
Returns an iterator delivering an infinity set of uniformly continuous distributed random numbers using the Mersenne Twister PRNG (pseudo random number generator).
Note:
The returned iterator delivers an infinite set of objects of type Double, so don't call Cursors.last( RandomNumbers.cuniform()).

Parameters:
min - lower bound
max - upper bound
Returns:
an iterator delivering an infinite set of uniformly continuous distributed random numbers

binomial

public static DiscreteRandomNumber binomial(int n,
                                            double p)
Provides binomial distributed random elements.

Parameters:
n - possible values k=0,...,n
p - binomial probability
Returns:
cursor delivering binomial distributed random elements

public static DiscreteRandomNumber binomial(int n,
                                            double p,
                                            long numberOfElements)
Provides a given number of binomial distributed random elements.

Parameters:
n - possible values k=0,...,n
p - binomial probability
numberOfElements - number of elements
Returns:
cursor delivering binomial distributed random elements

Provides poisson distributed random elements.

Parameters:

                                           long numberOfElements)
Provides a given number of poisson distributed random elements.

Parameters:
lambda - parameter lambda of the poisson distribution
numberOfElements - number of elements
Returns:

poisson

public static DiscreteRandomNumber poisson(double lambda,
                                           long numberOfElements,
                                           int seed)
Provides a given number of poisson distributed random elements.

Parameters:
lambda - parameter lambda of the poisson distribution
numberOfElements - number of elements
seed - the seed
Returns:
cursor delivering binomial distributed random elements

duniform

public static DiscreteRandomNumber duniform(int min,
                                            int max)
Provides uniformly discrete distributed random numbers from min to max, i.e., from the closed interval [min, max] including min and max.

Parameters:
min - lower bound
max - upper bound
Returns:
cursor delivering uniformly distributed discrete random numbers

duniform

public static DiscreteRandomNumber duniform(int min,
                                            int max,
                                            long numberOfElements)
Provides a given number of uniformly discrete distributed random numbers from min to max, i.e., from the closed interval [min, max] including min and max.

Parameters:
min - lower bound
max - upper bound
numberOfElements - Number of elements of the cursor
Returns:
cursor delivering uniformly distributed discrete random numbers

duniform

public static DiscreteRandomNumber duniform(int min,
                                            int max,
                                            long numberOfElements,
                                            int seed)
Provides a given number of uniformly discrete distributed numbers from min to max, i.e from the closed interval [min, max] including min and max. Additionally, the PRNG is initialized with a given seed.

Parameters:
min - lower bound
max - upper bound
numberOfElements - Number of elements of the cursor
seed - used seed to initialize the PRNG
Returns:
cursor delivering uniformly distributed discrete random numbers

cp01

public static ContinuousRandomNumber cp01(long numberOfElements,
                                          int seed1,
                                          int seed2)
Provides random numbers following the CP1-distribution.

Parameters:
numberOfElements - number of elements
seed1 - seed for the inversion distribution based PRNG
seed2 - seed for the rejection distribution based PRNG
Returns:
cursor delivering CP1 distributed random numbers
See Also:
RealFunctions.pdfCP01()

main

public static void main(String[] args)
The main method contains some examples to demonstrate the usage and the functionality of this class.

Parameters:
args - array of String arguments. It can be used to submit parameters when the main method is called.
